quality_check_questions.question: Is the pillow replaced by a cube composed of stacked LEGO bricks with equal dimensions on all sides, right angles, and no visible gaps or misalignments?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of changing the bed base to a plain white LEGO baseplate, this question evaluates whether the bed frame and foundation now appear flat, seamless, and uniformly white, consistent with a LEGO baseplate. quality_check_questions.question: Is the bed base a flat, white, seamless surface with no visible wood grain, shadows, or depth cues, resembling a standard LEGO baseplate?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of setting the background to a smooth white surface, this question checks whether all original environmental elements (walls, window, nightstand, rug, picture) have been removed and replaced with a uniform white backdrop.
